dcterms:creator: J. Ortega-Garcia
J. Fierrez
dcterms:description: The BioSecure multimodal database (BMDB) includes data from various biometric modalities collected in multiple scenarios and environments, aimed at evaluating biometric recognition systems.
dcterms:title: BioSecure multimodal database

dcterms:creator: B. Ton
R. Veldhuis
dcterms:description: The UTFVP database is a high-quality dataset of finger vascular patterns collected using a custom-designed capturing device, intended for biometric research.
dcterms:title: UTFVP database

dcterms:creator: A. Uhl
P. Wild
dcterms:description: The University of Salzburg Iris Toolkit provides a collection of tools and datasets for iris recognition research, including algorithms for iris segmentation.
dcterms:title: University of Salzburg Iris Toolkit

dcterms:description: FaceRecLib is an open-source framework designed for standardized comparisons of face recognition algorithms, providing a comprehensive dataset for research.
dcterms:title: FaceRecLib
